name: 陳信安
objective: This course is to introduce elementary topics about Solid-State Physics in materials science.
schedule:
1. Review of modern physics
2. Solid and crystal structure
3. Reciprocal lattice
4. Free electron gas
5. Energy band
6. Tight binding method
7. Band structure and density of states
8. Lattice vibration
9. Other related topics
materials:
Introduction to Solid State Physics, Charles Kittel
(Optional)
Solid State Physics, Neil W. Ashcroft and N. David Mermin
